subject: Re: RegEx Substitution + Arrays
body:
yitzle wrote:
> What's the best way to apply a RegEx to an array? For loop?
> @arr = qw/dc2ds reew12dsfa df2fdw/;
> s/$find/$replace/ for(@arr);

Yep, you can do that. Or use map()

map(s/$find/$replace/, @arr);
